about_the_game:
In the future world, people live in the electronic network world, and data has become the most important thing. A new type of intelligent disguised virus invades and kidnaps various data, attempting to threaten and dominate the real world, putting the entire world on the brink of destruction, Humans are almost losing all data permissions, as a commander of special operations, your consciousness and attack code combine to enter the cyber electronic space and fight against the most difficult viruses, breaking through enemies and competing for the most important core data.
﻿
You combine with the entity that avatar the attack code and enter the cyber electronic space to fight against intelligent disguised viruses. Your commands will determine the future.
﻿
-6 uniquely charming characters
-Free combination of over 60 module skills
-Cracking modules during combat will randomly change, and controlling the number, combination, and timing of module usage is the most important ability in combat
detailed_description:
In the future world, people live in the electronic network world, and data has become the most important thing. A new type of intelligent disguised virus invades and kidnaps various data, attempting to threaten and dominate the real world, putting the entire world on the brink of destruction, Humans are almost losing all data permissions, as a commander of special operations, your consciousness and attack code combine to enter the cyber electronic space and fight against the most difficult viruses, breaking through enemies and competing for the most important core data.
﻿
You combine with the entity that avatar the attack code and enter the cyber electronic space to fight against intelligent disguised viruses. Your commands will determine the future.
﻿
-6 uniquely charming characters
-Free combination of over 60 module skills
-Cracking modules during combat will randomly change, and controlling the number, combination, and timing of module usage is the most important ability in combat
name: Attack Core

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 推荐分辨率：1920 x 1080；推荐将游戏安装在SSD
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5+
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 及以上
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 推荐分辨率：2560 x 1440；推荐将游戏安装在SSD

short_description: A fully 3D action barrage, roguelite game with a huge range and a large number of monsters, featuring highly growing and visually impactful module skills, and refreshing battles characterized by random transformations and constructions during battles.
supported_languages:
English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support
